紫云苗族布依族自治縣.pinyin: zǐ yún miáo zú bù yī zú zì zhì xiàn
紫云苗族布依族自治縣.definition: Ziyun Hmong and Buyei autonomous county in Anshun 安順|安顺[An1 shun4], Guizhou

紫嘯鶇.definition: (bird species of China) blue whistling thrush (Myophonus caeruleus)

紫壽帶.definition: (bird species of China) black paradise flycatcher; Japanese paradise flycatcher (Terpsiphone atrocaudata)

紫寬嘴鶇.definition: (bird species of China) purple cochoa (Cochoa purpurea)

紫式部.definition: Murasaki Shikibu (born c. 973), Japanese writer, author of "The Tale of Genji"

紫微斗數.definition: Zi Wei Dou Shu, a form of Chinese fortune-telling

紫杉醇.definition: Taxol (a.k.a. Paclitaxel), mitotic inhibitor used in cancer chemotherapy

紫林鴿.definition: (bird species of China) pale-capped pigeon (Columba punicea)

紫水雞.definition: (bird species of China) grey-headed swamphen (Porphyrio poliocephalus)

紫石英號.definition: HMS Amethyst, Royal Navy corvette involved in a 1949 gunfight with the PLA on the Changjiang

紫砂.definition: a type of clay found in the region of Yixing 宜興|宜兴[Yi2 xing1], used to make Yixing stoneware, with its distinctive russet or dark purple coloring

紫禁城.definition: the Forbidden City; the Imperial Palace in Beijing; same as 故宮|故宫[Gu4 gong1]

紫翅椋鳥.definition: (bird species of China) common starling (Sturnus vulgaris)

紫背椋鳥.definition: (bird species of China) chestnut-cheeked starling (Agropsar philippensis)

紫背葦鳽.definition: (bird species of China) von Schrenck's bittern (Ixobrychus eurhythmus)

紫色花蜜鳥.definition: (bird species of China) purple sunbird (Cinnyris asiaticus)

紫草.definition: red root gromwell (Lithospermum erythrorhizon); flowering plant whose roots provide purple dye; arnebia (plant genus in family Boraginaceae)

紫菜.definition: edible seaweed of genus Porphyra or genus Pyropia, esp. one used to make dried sheets of nori

紫菜包飯.definition: gimbap, aka kimbap (Korean dish made by rolling up steamed rice and other ingredients in a sheet of nori)

紫菜苔.definition: purple cabbage; Brassica campestris var. purpurea

紫袍.definition: purple qipao gown, the sign of an official position

紫金.definition: Zijin county in Heyuan 河源[He2 yuan2], Guangdong

紫金山.definition: Purple Mountain in suburbs of Nanjing, with Ming tombs and Sun Yat-sen's mausoleum

紫金山天文台.pinyin: zǐ jīn shān tiān wén tái

紫金縣.definition: Zijin county in Heyuan 河源[He2 yuan2], Guangdong

紫金鵑.definition: (bird species of China) violet cuckoo (Chrysococcyx xanthorhynchus)

紫銅.definition: copper (pure copper, as opposed to alloy)

紫陽.definition: Ziyang County in Ankang 安康[An1 kang1], Shaanxi

紫陽縣.definition: Ziyang County in Ankang 安康[An1 kang1], Shaanxi

紫雲.definition: Ziyun Hmong and Buyei autonomous county in Anshun 安順|安顺[An1 shun4], Guizhou

紫頰直嘴太陽鳥.pinyin: zǐ jiá zhí zuǐ tài yáng niǎo
紫頰直嘴太陽鳥.definition: (bird species of China) ruby-cheeked sunbird (Chalcoparia singalensis)
